# Tender Announcement: Elder Services - Ontario Region

## Background
The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC), as part of the Canadian criminal justice system, is seeking a supplier to provide Elder services to Indigenous offenders in the Ontario Region. The services will include spiritual and cultural support, guidance, and traditional ceremonies to promote healing and balance.

## Tender Description
The CSC requires a supplier who can provide the following services:

* Provide ceremonial and spiritual services to Indigenous offenders, including counseling, teachings, and traditional ceremonies
* Offer advice and guidance to CSC staff on Indigenous spirituality and cultural practices
* Participate in case management conferences and provide updates on offender participation in healing paths
* Provide monthly reports to the Technical Authority on services provided and hours completed

## Supplier Requirements
To be considered, suppliers must:

* Be recognized as an Elder or Cultural Advisor within their Indigenous community
* Have a minimum of five years of experience in delivering spiritual and cultural services to Indigenous people, including:
	+ Providing counseling and guidance according to traditional teachings
	+ Conducting traditional ceremonies with a focus on healing
* Meet with a circle of Elders already under contract with CSC to validate their statement of capabilities

## Contract Details
The contract is for a period of one year, with the option to extend for four additional one-year periods. The estimated value of the contract, including options, is $433,302.90 to $544,152.72 (GST/HST extra), depending on the supplier selected.

## Contact Information
Suppliers who are interested in submitting a statement of capabilities can contact:
 Danielle Murdoch, Regional Contract Administrator
 Correctional Service Canada, Ontario Region
 P.O. Box 1174, 445 Union Street West
 Kingston, Ontario K7L 4Y8
 Phone: 343-422-4831
 Fax: 613-536-4571
 Email: danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca

## Closing Date
The closing date for accepting statements of capabilities is March 21, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST.

Note: There are four suppliers selected for the contract, including Brodrick Gabriel, Marilyn Sutherland, Elissa Johnson, and Lois MacDonald. However, the contract is not awarded yet and other suppliers can submit their statements of capabilities to participate in the tender. JFYI.
